sentences.sentence: But the good news is when life deals out its cruellest blows, our unconscious will be working overtime to find the upside.
sentences.translation: 但庆幸的是每当生活展示它最残酷的一面时，我们的潜意识总是卖力地寻找出好的一面。

sentences.sentence: It was the cruellest blow to Gandhi.
sentences.translation: 这是对甘地最残酷的打击。
